text: then the man shall bring his wife to the priest, and shall bring her offering for her: one tenth of an ephah5:15 1 ephah is about 22 liters or about 2/3 of a bushel of barley meal. He shall pour no oil on it, nor put frankincense on it, for it is a meal offering of jealousy, a meal offering of memorial, bringing iniquity to memory.
